author: BigPattyOG (BareCoding)
install_msg: WARNING! This cog is solely for managing the BS API for this bot. Nothing else!. Run `!bsapi token <TOKEN>` to set the token!
name: BS-APIAdmin
short: Admin/test commands for the Brawl Stars API.
description: Stores the API token per guild and provides simple player/club test calls.
end_user_data_statement: Stores the guild's Brawl Stars API token.
